## PackageJson.Exports type

Entry points of a module, optionally with conditions and subpath exports.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Exports =
    	| string
    	| string[]
    	| {[key in ExportCondition]: Exports}
    	| {[key: string]: Exports};
```
